channel.title: Comments on: Day 23 – Therapy is Fun! – April 28

item.title: By: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.description: Dear Sue, I am so pleased and excited to hear of your progress. Hurray for you. I am also very happy that you said you would like me to visit. I will try to go this weekend. I will call first to be certain you are up for me to come. I wrote A SHORT story in February. It is pretty funny so I will bring it with me. I will read it to you if you would like to laugh with me. I hope it does not hurt for you to laugh. See you soon. Love, Debbie
item.content:encoded:
Dear Sue,
I am so pleased and excited to hear of your progress. Hurray for you. I am also very happy that you said you would like me to visit. I will try to go this weekend. I will call first to be certain you are up for me to come. I wrote A SHORT story in February. It is pretty funny so I will bring it with me. I will read it to you if you would like to laugh with me.
I hope it does not hurt for you to laugh.
See you soon. Love, Debbie
